full_text: There are credible reports of Ethiopia's government forces or their allies killing livestock and burning crops in Tigray. If true, both the perpetrators and those ordering them are guilty of war crimes https://t.co/LJQDFCGgIA

localize.full_text: 有可信的报告说,埃塞俄比亚政府部队或其盟友在提格雷杀害牲畜和焚烧庄稼。如果属实,肇事者和下令者都犯有战争罪https://t.co/LJQDFCGgIA。
有可信的報告說,埃塞俄比亞政府部隊或其盟友在提格雷殺害牲畜和焚燒莊稼。如果屬實,肇事者和下令者都犯有戰爭罪https://t.co/LJQDFCGgIA。
